jobTitle: Business Analysts, Data Architects, Data Migration Consultants
jobDescription: Hot Job: Data Migration ConsultantLocation: Silver Spring, MarylandRESPONSIBILITIES:Design Data Collection, Migration, and Quality Control Procedures  Design and incorporate a robust set of quality control (QC) procedures to ensure that data and metadata are captured accurately, consistently, and without confounding errors. The QC procedures will include documenting data provenance (e.g., source, date of extraction), data lineage (e.g., transformations, missing value handling), and identifying automated and semi-automated testing and reviews (e.g., peer, management reviews). Compile the component inputs into a draft plan.REQUIREMENTS:Be able to build data queries in PL/SQL and data mapping in Informatica products (PowerCenter and IDQ). Familarity with Informatica MDM, and ILM is desirable.Need to have 5+ years of data migration experience and have strong communication skills.
